jd: Hi Greetings from Info Logitech, IncHere is our open requirement which can be filled immediately Kindly respond to this requirement with your resume, contact and current location info to speed up the interview process Job Position : DOE Senior Agile Program ManagerJob Location : Trenton, NJJob Duration : 12 Months Job Description : We are seeking a Senior Agile Program Manager to drive the successful delivery of complex projects using Agile methodologies. This role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams and working with Salesforce, Snowflake, and AWS technologies.Note: This is a Hybrid position - 3 Days On-Site, 2 Days RemoteUnder the direction of a supervisor in the Office of Information Technology at the New Jersey Department of Education, this position will be responsible for overseeing the planning, execution, and delivery of multiple Agile projects, ensuring alignment with business objectives. This role involves collaborating with cross-functional teams, managing program timelines, and driving continuous improvement across projects. The successful candidate will interact with key technologies such as Salesforce, Snowflake, and AWS to ensure seamless program delivery and efficient operations. The candidate will follow Agile best practices, remove roadblocks, and work closely with stakeholders to ensure goals are met on time and within scope. Key Responsibilities:Lead and manage the delivery of complex,high-impact programs using Agile methodologies.Partner with product owners, stakeholders, and cross-functional teams to align priorities and ensure strategic objectives are met.Facilitate Agile ceremonies (standups, retrospectives, planning) and drive continuous improvement across teams.Identify and address any impediments that may affect program timelines or deliverables.Implement scalable Agile practices and Agile principles.Communicate program status, risks, and opportunities to stakeholders and executives.Ensure programs are delivered on time, within budget, and meet quality standards. Qualifications:Extensive experience in Agile Program Management, with a proven track record of leading successful Agile transformations.Experience working with Salesforce, Snowflake, and AWS technologies. (Desired)Strong leadership, problem-solving, and organizational skills.Excellent communication and stakeholder management abilities.Experience in scaling Agile practices across teams and departments. Required / Desired SkillsProject Management (end-to-end lifecycle) Required 7 YearsCross-functional Collaboration Required 7 YearsStakeholder Communication and Engagement Required 7 Years Budgeting and Financial Planning Required 7 YearsExperience with Agile/Waterfall Methodologies Required 7 YearsScheduling and Timeline Management Required 7 YearsRisk Identification and Mitigation Required 7 YearsResource Allocation and Capacity Planning Required 7 YearsChange Management Integration Required 7 Years Experience with Jira and Confluence (or something similar) Required 7 YearsExperience leading multiple projects from end to end Required 5 YearsBachelor's Degree Required
